name: Insectipede
summary: A New Retro Classic Centipede Arcade Game. Blast your way through waves of Centipedes and UFO’s in this fast paced 80’s style modern remake. 50 Challenging Stages with Vibrant Colors, Waves of Centipedes and UFOs, Arcade High Scores, Power-Ups and Full Controller Support. Time To Bug Out… Are You Ready For It?
